name: A Day in the Life of Richard Stump
name_original: A Day in the Life of Richard Stump
description:
Bored? Come experience a day in the life of Richard Stump as he gets ready for his day! 

Wake up in someone else's shoes for a change. Get dressed, make coffee and breakfast, brush your teeth, wash your face and take a shower, talk to your neighbour but don't forget to feed your cat first! Enjoy the simple life of a simple man.

Theme: Boredom

Boredom is different from person to person. Sometimes one TV show is exciting for one person and boring for another.  However, something everyone gets bored of is doing the same thing over and over. Unfortunately, that's what Richard Stump's life is filled with. Repetitive tasks over and over and over with no end in sight.

How to Play

Basic Movement: WASD + Mouse

Interact: E

Task List: T

Group Name: WorkingTitle

Nicky Schubert (Producer, Game design & Code), Zeeshan Baig (Art & Code), Julianna Da Silva (Art, Animation & Code), Linda Tieu (UI, Art & Code), Kyatheswar Amudhala (Music & Sound)
